alt: screenshot of text editor and terminal
title: FAT32 File System
description: In this project I implemented a functional FAT32 file system using a text file in place of an actual storage device. It demonstrates understading of high level computer science topics in operating systems and file systems.
description2: The system is able to store any 20Kb text file within it's volume. In the example screenshot I used MLK's famous I had a dream speech. In the FAT (left) you can see the file being allocated. In the volume (right) you can see a subsection of the file's content being stored using the index allocation method for file management.

title: Link Locker
description: A website that encodes and decodes URLs with a given password. This application works by using a two way hash algorithm to encode and decode the link.

title: Windows 95 Web UI
description: A frontend project aimed at recreating the iconic Windows 95 user interface. Features a smei-functional Windows start menu, clock and functional windowing system.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app that uses the OpenWeatherMap API to get the current weather of a location. The app is able to display the temperature, humidity, and weather condition of the location.

title: Hunted Hero Comics Club Website
description: A quick landing page for a student club I was a part of to showcase comics and host important links. Since our funding was inconsistent and a non tech savy person would have to update the site, I made it entirely frontend acessible.
